mdRecord.dcterms:title: Erlenmeyer flask and 2 beakers
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Corning Incorporated [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Consists of the following: 1 50 ml beaker, 1 100 ml beaker, and 1 125 ml erlenmeyer flask. The following text is printed on all of the vessels: "T.M. REG PYREX U.S. PAT. OFF. MADE IN U.S.A.".
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
